name: Chocolate Lava Cake
description: Warm chocolate cake with a gooey center, served with vanilla ice cream.

description: Classic Italian dessert with layers of mascarpone and coffee-soaked ladyfingers.

description: Vanilla custard topped with a crispy caramelized sugar crust.

name: Mango Sticky Rice Mille-Feuille
description: Fusion dessert combining Thai mango sticky rice and French pastry.

name: Lychee Rose Jelly
description: Light and refreshing jelly infused with lychee and rose flavors.

name: Honeycomb Parfait
description: Creamy honey parfait served with homemade honeycomb.

name: Raspberry Cheesecake
description: Rich cheesecake topped with raspberry sauce and fresh berries.

name: Lemon Tart
description: Tangy lemon custard in a buttery tart shell.

name: Matcha Swiss Roll
description: Fluffy matcha sponge cake rolled with sweet cream filling.

name: Salted Caramel Brownie
description: Decadent chocolate brownie topped with salted caramel.

name: Pavlova
description: Crispy meringue topped with fresh cream and seasonal fruits.

name: Banoffee Pie
description: Layered dessert with bananas, caramel, and whipped cream.

name: Pistachio Baklava
description: Flaky pastry layered with pistachios and honey syrup.

name: Sticky Toffee Pudding
description: Warm date cake soaked in toffee sauce, served with vanilla ice cream.

name: Chocolate Mousse
description: Rich chocolate mousse topped with whipped cream and chocolate shavings.

name: Coconut Panna Cotta
description: Creamy coconut panna cotta topped with tropical fruits.

name: Apple Crumble
description: Baked apples with a crunchy crumble topping, served with vanilla custard.

name: Crepes Suzette
description: Thin crepes served with orange liqueur sauce and flambéed.

name: Macarons
description: Assorted French macarons with a variety of flavors.

name: Peach Cobbler
description: Warm peach cobbler served with a scoop of vanilla ice cream.

name: Black Sesame Ice Cream
description: Rich and creamy black sesame flavored ice cream.

name: Yuzu Sorbet
description: Refreshing sorbet infused with the tangy taste of yuzu.

name: Mocha Éclair

name: Carrot Cake
description: Moist carrot cake topped with cream cheese frosting.
